TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void OpenWriteCompletedEventHandler(object sender, OpenWriteCompletedEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed OpenWriteCompletedEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub OpenWriteCompletedEventHandler(sender As Object, e As OpenWriteCompletedEventArgs)
public delegate void OpenWriteCompletedEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, OpenWriteCompletedEventArgs ^ e);
type OpenWriteCompletedEventHandler = delegate of obj * OpenWriteCompletedEventArgs -> unit

summary.span: 表示将用来处理 的 事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the event of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建 委托时，需要标识将处理该事件的方法。When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非移除了该委托，否则每当发生该事件时就会调用事件处理程序。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何打开流以写入要上载的数据。The following code example demonstrates opening a stream to write data to be uploaded. [!code-cpp[NCLWebClientAsync#16](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CPP/asyncmethods.cpp#16)] [!code-csharp[NCLWebClientAsync#16](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CS/asyncmethods.cs#16)] [!code-vb[NCLWebClientAsync#16](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/VB/asyncmethods.vb#16)] 当流可用时，将调用以下方法。The following method is called when the stream is available. [!code-cpp[NCLWebClientAsync#15](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CPP/asyncmethods.cpp#15)] [!code-csharp[NCLWebClientAsync#15](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CS/asyncmethods.cs#15)] [!code-vb[NCLWebClientAsync#15](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/VB/asyncmethods.vb#15)]
